title: A turning point for women’s racing: Tour de l’Avenir Femmes makes its debut
content:
Gaia Realini, Shirin van Anrooij, Fem van Empel, and Antonia Niedermaier are among the riders on the star-studded start list.

Read the full article at A turning point for women’s racing: Tour de l’Avenir Femmes makes its debut on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
